name: The Crisper Whisperer: Banana Peanut Butter Smoothies
description: You may know Carolyn Cope as Umami Girl. She stops by on Tuesdays with ideas on preparing fruits and vegetables. —The Mgmt. [Photograph: Carolyn Cope] Along with coffee, avocados, and lemons, bananas are one of the top reasons I could...
recipeIngredient: 1 large ripe banana, broken into chunks

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all ingredients in a blender and purée until very smooth. Serve immediately.
